pages.text: Similar to the Magnet upgrade except it will collect xp, and hold it in its internal buffer.$(br)It will also absorb xp from a player who is colliding (has their body against) with the pedestal with this upgrade.$(br)The speed enchant increases how fast it pulls xp and capacity enchant will increase how many levels itll absorb at one time.$(br)You need to connect another exp upgrade, like the Exp Tank to this upgrade in order to transfer the levels out, as the buffer maxes at 30 levels of storage.
